attributes.action: Hear the people and to take note of this petition of NO CONFEDENCE in yourself and your goverment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask that all sign this petition.If you are being blead dry by taxes.Lost your job.Sign and tell the P.M and the goverment to RESIGN.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
